channel.title: Who Wants me to Release my RscR source?
channel.description:
The most advanced Demonik Server, with IP banning. Custom site, everything.
Etc. Etc. Yes, No? Maybe?
Everything working, Pking 100% I fixed it, so there's no dc's.
I just don't got time to put it up at all.

item.title: Who Wants me to Release my RscR source?
item.dc:creator: @Peter Peeter
item.description:
@Peter wrote:

What the fuck was this topic supposed to achieve?

“SAY PLEASE IF U WANT MY SOURCE”. Either release it and contribute, or don’t and fuck off.

Read full topic
item.source: Who Wants me to Release my RscR source?

item.title: Who Wants me to Release my RscR source?
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“gawdz666, post:34, topic:336587”]why is this server development?

just a question that should be answered truthfully.

because no-one and i mean no-one contributes shit no more and this is a flame war inside a thread that means nothing to RSC or coding in general.[/quote]

No clue as to why this is even a thread…

As for contributing, I have thought about it, and done a little… Honestly, it’s more of a hassle when you contribute than not, because everyone tries to talk shit about it, and say how worthless it is, then they turn around and use it…

Read full topic

item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“5 1, post:33, topic:336587”][quote author=snoopy89 link=topic=432956.msg3198568#msg3198568 date=1273059626]

yeaa so phunny, wanna hear a bad joke?? “YOU”. Thats right you are a joke, I belive your xml skills doens’t help you to much here.

Rich coming from the owner of an XML edited server. Good job Mario.

our server would own your so called a source in so many ways, even known you ripped most of it from me, david and sooo many other server you fail so much there. You are a leacher. Your clan system in noob v 3? mubby/xent and the other thing got released be somoen in noobscape to your so full of crap. Yong mininum n1 leacher here. I own you in so many ways you can’t even Imagine. If i wanted i crap souce i would go with noobscape there so much crap and you dind’t make any of it yourself… goodjob calling yourself Yong min coder repp me im a faggot.
[/quote]
translator please

and why do you keep bragging about your easy rsc server? It’s easy rsc with a total of 2-3 updates. You’re so pro. And Yong Min’s clan system isn’t xent\mubbys. It’s meatsticks clan system now ;)[/quote]

First you want a translator then you answer it? Yea I quess you real smart, You failed there again. Dan You should stop befor you start sucking your moms tits again.

item.title: Who Wants me to Release my RscR source?
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote author=The_AFKer link=topic=432956.msg3180491#msg3180491 date=1271266805]I clearly said right under “&^ who the hell is dumb enough to continue demonik…”, one would assume that I was meaning neither sources (which are from the same RSCD base) are advanced. Glad you took the time to explain the amount of exploits/issues with RSCD, but to say it’s advanced is far from the truth. Consider this, what YOU may think is advanced, may not be advanced to those who have already completed it or gone above and beyond it. Now if we’re talking stability, yeah you are right a few patches to them and you have a functioning server. The OP was merely asking whether he should release it, not whether or not it’s advanced enough for people to use.

Again, I said, “Why bother? Just using RSCD is more advanced/stable.” and you replied with, “Lol, no it’s not.”

I didn’t say it IS advanced or it’s the MOST advanced, I said it’s MORE advanced/stable than Demonik. Nothing more, nothing less.

Christ, and you talk about logic…[/quote]
Way to miss the point of it…

I think he knows RSCD is more advanced, where you’re missing it is that I don’t think he cares.

Read full topic
item.source: Who Wants me to Release my RscR source?

item.source: Who Wants me to Release my RscR source?

item.title: Who Wants me to Release my RscR source?
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote author=The_AFKer link=topic=432956.msg3178872#msg3178872 date=1271115869]Read…

[quote author=Kryptix link=topic=432956.msg3178235#msg3178235 date=1271072965]Why bother? Just using RSCD is more advanced/stable.

Lol, no it’s not. It’s original creators abandoned it for a reason…[/quote]
I said, “Why bother? Just using RSCD is more advanced/stable.” and you replied with, “Lol, no it’s not.”

How could you have meant anything else other than RSCD is not more advanced/stable than Demonik? I really don’t think you should be telling me to read…

And no, they didn’t get bored. They were disgusted by it’s ugly design, it’s NOT stable, unless you modify most of the code. Of course, I wouldn’t expect you to know since Zilent does that for you…

It’s unstable if you have a lot online but most of the instability issues are unpatched exploits. When we had RSCD running with practically no edits what-so-ever it was up for 2-3 weeks straight with 100-200 players online at all times until we got took down by an exploit. With a connection/packet throttle, secured server and secured web files (nothing to do with RSCD’s design or code), the packet encoding/decoding changed to Stork’s and a few other little bits it will quite easily be up for weeks on end with 200+ online (which is far more than any new server is likely to see).

I’m not saying it’s the best and I’m not saying most of it can’t be improved but it’s far, far more stable than Demonik and far, far, far more stable than the ‘RscReloaded’ as when I actually went on it spawning 6 NPC’s in the same area would disconnect everyone for example…[/quote]

Where the hell do you get your logic from? Your ass? I clearly said right under “&^ who the hell is dumb enough to continue demonik…”, one would assume that I was meaning neither sources (which are from the same RSCD base) are advanced. Glad you took the time to explain the amount of exploits/issues with RSCD, but to say it’s advanced is far from the truth. Consider this, what YOU may think is advanced, may not be advanced to those who have already completed it or gone above and beyond it. Now if we’re talking stability, yeah you are right a few patches to them and you have a functioning server. The OP was merely asking whether he should release it, not whether or not it’s advanced enough for people to use.

Read full topic
